creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: pale green background with brown horizontal lines; faint yellow vertical lines on outer side edges and two in the center; faint pink sections in URQ and on left center edge; faint red vertical lines in center; two embroidered arms with outstretched hands on top right and top left edges; embroidered coin in upper right edge; small wrench in center left edge; embroidered face mask and two larger wrenches in LLQ
markings: Yossi Milo gallery label on back, in LLC; certificate of authenticity taped on back in bottom center
title: Heidelberg Blanket Y2 (Damiani Editore, Faenza, Italy)
